name: War Plus
description:
Its war but with abilities

Since someone commented on one of my devlogs how difficult making card games could be,  I started brainstorming on some card game ideas and this is one of them. This game was made in  3 days. Hope you enjoy! 

Controls:

You can only play your abilities when your played cards are flipped

  • Q - Use Ability 1 (Player 1)
  • A - Use Ability 2 (Player 1)
  • Z - Use Ability 3 (Player 1)
  • S - End Turn (Player 1)
  • P - Use Ability 1 (Player 2)
  • L - Use Ability 2 (Player 2)
  • ,  - Use Ability 3 (Player 2)
  • K - End Turn (Player 2)
  • R - Restart Game

Version 1.0.0
